description: Convert text and layout annotations to PDF format (overlaying original image with text layer and polygon outlines)

font.description: Font file to be used in PDF file. If unset, AletheiaSans.ttf is used. (Make sure to pick a font which covers all glyphs!)

outlines.description: What segment hierarchy to draw coordinate outlines for. If unset, no outlines are drawn.

textequiv_level.description: What segment hierarchy level to render text output from. If unset, no text is rendered.

negative2zero.description: Set all negative box values to 0

multipage.description: Merge all PDFs into one mulitpage file. The value is used as filename for the pdf.

pagelabel.description: Parameter for 'multipage': Set the page information, which will be used as pagelabel. Default is 'pageId', e.g. the option 'pagenumber' will create numbered pagelabel consecutively
